title: What Happened to Sepp Kuss at the Vuelta a España? ‘He Didn’t Have the Level We Hoped For’
content:
After brilliant 2023, Kuss and Visma-Lease a Bike leave the Vuelta a España wondering what could have been: 'It was a race of ups and downs.'

Read the full article at What Happened to Sepp Kuss at the Vuelta a España? ‘He Didn’t Have the Level We Hoped For’ on Velo.
author: ahood
